name: Polar Pursuit
description:
A short and relaxing game where your goal is to escape from a spirit that wants to consume your soul. Be careful and don't let it come too close...

Controls (Xbox controller compatible):

Move: arrow keys/w a s d

Interact: enter/e

Cancel: esc

Made in RPG Maker MV with the help of plugins from:

Yanfly / Chickie / Zevia / SumRndmDde / mjshi

ocean pollen / Atreyo Rey / Shaz / Mr. Trivel / Galv

Tor Damian Design / Meike (meike.hehasplans.com)

Yami / Karberus / Kuoushi / Deadlift / Biud / Zarby
